title: Joe Moglia on his Career and the State of the NCAA
itunes:title: Joe Moglia on his Career and the State of the NCAA
description:
Join Michael Barr and guest host Damian Sassower as they chat with former chairman of the board and CEO of TD Ameritrade and former head football coach at Coastal Carolina University, Joe Moglia, who gives us insight on NIL, NCAA decision making and more on Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
